dcterms:creator: Vincenzo Lomonaco
Davide Maltoni
dcterms:description: CORe50 is an object recognition dataset designed for different continual learning scenarios. It consists of 50 domestic objects, where each object belongs to one of the 10 categories. The dataset has been acquired in 11 distinct sessions covering different backgrounds and lighting conditions, totaling 164,866 RGB-D images with 128 x 128 pixels.
dcterms:title: CORe50
